content:
Last year, Denise harvested $3000$ metric tons of crops on her farm.  This year, she wants to exceed last year's count by at least $2000$ metric tons. Each field of corn she harvests will yield $200$ metric tons, and each field of soybeans will yield $200$ metric tons.


**Write an *inequality* that represents the number of fields of corn $(C)$ and fields of soybeans $(S)$ Denise will need to plow to achieve her harvest goal.**

[[☃ expression 1]]

**Graph the constraint equation with $S$ on the horizontal axis and $C$ on the vertical axis.**

[[☃ interactive-graph 1]]

**If Denise plows $10$ fields of corn $(C)$, which of the following numbers of fields of soybeans $(S)$ can she plow to meet or exceed the harvest goal?** 

[[☃ radio 1]]
